alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:32AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Saline County through 300 AM CDT... At 231 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Culver, or 12 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving east to southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, brief heavy rain, frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, New Cambria and Glendale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 91 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Kansas.
